originalText.text: Excellent doctor. Very thorough and knowledgeable. Highly recommended

text.text: Excellent doctor. Very thorough and knowledgeable. Highly recommended

originalText.text:
Dr. Brown is the best.
1. He knows his stuff and makes you feel totally comfortable.
2. He doesn't make you wait forever.
3. He's not pushy.
4. Seems genuinely interested in me as a person and as a patient.
6/5 stars

originalText.text: I've been seen. Dr. Brown for several years now and can highly recommend this wonderful dermatologist.  He is extremely knowledgeable, kind and thoughtful.  He always take his time and really listens.  Staff is lovely and makes you feel comfortable.  I've been so happy with the results which I why I continue to be a loyal patient of Dr. Brown.

text.text: I've been seen. Dr. Brown for several years now and can highly recommend this wonderful dermatologist.  He is extremely knowledgeable, kind and thoughtful.  He always take his time and really listens.  Staff is lovely and makes you feel comfortable.  I've been so happy with the results which I why I continue to be a loyal patient of Dr. Brown.

originalText.text: Dr. Brown is an A+ dermatologist. He takes his time with his patients and makes sure they understand everything. My daughter had a skin condition, which he was able to treat right away. He and his staff were very kind and courteous. I highly recommended him!

text.text: Dr. Brown is an A+ dermatologist. He takes his time with his patients and makes sure they understand everything. My daughter had a skin condition, which he was able to treat right away. He and his staff were very kind and courteous. I highly recommended him!

originalText.text: As a Native New Yorker I have seen quite a few Dermatologists over the years. My search was over In 2006 when I started seeing Lance H. Brown. He is the most knowledgable and gifted Dermatologist I have ever seen. He has solved numerous skin issues over the years as well has done amazing cosmetic work on my wife. My wife feels more confident because she knows he is always willing and able to keep her skin beautiful and healthy.  My favorite story was when I had an accident and tore the bridge of my nose open. We considered the ER but first I called his office. He insisted on rushing me in an not to let anyone else stitch me. He stayed and waited for me and stitched me up with surgical precision. It is now 4 years later and I can not see any trace of a slice across my nose.
